== Main Inclusion Report for audacity ==

# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe and builds on our three major platforms
# ''Rationale:'' The package is required for the Edubuntu desktop
# ''Security:'' No CVEs or other security issues
# ''Quality assurance:''  
** Needs no setup after install
** One bug marked important (about not being foolproof), 8 normal in <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/audacity|Debbugs]]</nowiki>.
** Upstream seems not to use a bugtracker, bugtracker links point to a mail adress on their  <nowiki>[[http://audacity.sourceforge.net/contact/|contacts]]</nowiki> page.
# ''Standards compliance:'' The package meets the FHS and Debian Policy.
# ''Dependencies:''
** libwxgtk2.4-1
